simpledb

Class BPlusTreeUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.BPlusTreeUtility

  • public class BPlusTreeUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods used for testing and implementing random features.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BPlusTreeUtility.BPlusTreeDeleter
      Helper class that attempts to delete tuple(s) in a new thread
      static class  BPlusTreeUtility.BPlusTreeInserter
      Helper class that attempts to insert a tuple in a new thread
      (package private) static class  BPlusTreeUtility.BPlusTreeReader
      Helper class that searches for tuple(s) in a new thread
      (package private) static class  BPlusTreeUtility.BPlusTreeWriter
      Helper class that attempts to insert a tuple in a new thread

      • getBPlusTreeTuple

        public static Tuple getBPlusTreeTuple(int[] tupdata)
        Returns:
        a Tuple with an IntField for every element of tupdata and RecordId(BPlusTreePageId(1, 2, BPlusTreePageId.LEAF), 3)

      • getBPlusTreeTuple

        public static Tuple getBPlusTreeTuple(int n,
                      int width)
        Returns:
        a Tuple with a 'width' IntFields each with value n and with RecordId(BPlusTreePageId(1, 2, BPlusTreePageId.LEAF), 3)

      • createRandomBPlusTreeFile

        public static BPlusTreeFile createRandomBPlusTreeFile(int columns,
                                      int rows,
                                      int maxValue,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> columnSpecification,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> tuples,
                                      int keyField)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      DbException,
                                                      TransactionAbortedException
        Generates a random B+ tree file for testing
        Parameters:
        columns - - number of columns
        rows - - number of rows
        maxValue - - the maximum random value in this B+ tree
        columnSpecification - - optional column specification
        tuples - - optional list of tuples to return
        keyField - - the index of the key field
        Returns:
        a BPlusTreeFile
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DbException
        TransactionAbortedException

      • openBPlusTreeFile

        public static BPlusTreeFile openBPlusTreeFile(int cols,
                              java.io.File f,
                              int keyField)
        Opens a BPlusTreeFile and adds it to the catalog.
        Parameters:
        cols - number of columns in the table.
        f - location of the file storing the table.
        keyField - the field the B+ tree is keyed on
        Returns:
        the opened table.

      • openBPlusTreeFile

                              java.lang.String colPrefix,
                              java.io.File f,
                              int keyField)

      • createEmptyBPlusTreeFile

        public static BPlusTreeFile createEmptyBPlusTreeFile(java.lang.String path,
                                     int cols,
                                     int keyField)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        A utility method to create a new BPlusTreeFile with no data, assuming the path does not already exist. If the path exists, the file will be overwritten. The new table will be added to the Catalog with the specified number of columns as IntFields indexed on the keyField.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
